K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:153a-1: a'arya bo dhi satva tsarya ni rde sha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:155a-0: lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por @155a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:155a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag byung ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:166b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:166b-22: chos nyid kyi skye bo zhes bya bar yang zungs shig ;de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:166b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas; byang chub sems dpa' rin chen byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:166b-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:166b-28: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:167a-0: @167a *// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:167a-1: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:167a-2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-004:167a-4: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
